name: Helping Paws
description:
Helping Paws is a Bitsy game coded by me with lovely art by my friend Angela for the Hacks of Kindness Hackathon hosted by the University of Virginia's Women in Computer Science chapter on October 3, 2020 (https://uva-hacks-of-kindness.devpost.com/)

Use the four arrow keys or swipe on mobile to move and interact in the game after clicking on the game window.

This game was intended to teach children and players the rewards of giving and kindness. It was coded with Bitsy, Borksy hacks, and HTML in browser with art drawn on iPad, and was Angela and I's first hackathon project!
